pages.heading: Miner's Secrets
pages.text: Blocks drop exp on successful harvest. Drops +2exp per block. $(br2)Valid items: Tools, Swords, Charges.$(br2)Applies: Miner's Secrets I (256 blocks)

pages.heading: Miner's Secrets L
